code: import{GET_INIT_LIST,CHANGE_INPUT_VALUE,ADD_TODO_ITEM,DELETE_TODO_ITEM,INIT_LIST_ACTION}from'./actionTypes';export var getInputChangeAction=function getInputChangeAction(value){return{type:CHANGE_INPUT_VALUE,value:value};};export var getAddItemAction=function getAddItemAction(){return{type:ADD_TODO_ITEM};};export var getDeleteItemAction=function getDeleteItemAction(index){return{type:DELETE_TODO_ITEM,index:index};};export var initListAction=function initListAction(data){return{type:INIT_LIST_ACTION,data:data};};export var getInitList=function getInitList(){return{type:GET_INIT_LIST};};
